name: Advanced Workflow Templates
goal: Package the workflow toolkit, templates, and automation blueprints for support, sales, content, and analytics pipelines.

overview.summary: execute_workflow + templates for 4 business pipelines described in HIGH_VALUE_COMPONENTS.
goals: Reusable JSON workflow templates per domain

functional: Workflow definitions cover triggers, agent steps, telemetry hooks
Examples for support, sales, content, analytics
nonFunctional: Workflows execute under 60s for typical payload

acceptance: Four workflows (support, sales, content, analytics) stored in docs
Telemetry logged per step as described in doc
